ul_205651: Run A Cron Job Task Every 30 Seconds
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_11102: * * * * * for i in 0 1 2; do some_job & sleep 15; done; some_job

end=$(($(date +%s) + 45))
while true; do
  some_job &
  [ $(date +%s) -ge $end ] && break
  sleep 15
  wait
done
[ $(date +%s) -ge $(($end + 15)) ] || some_job

ul_205651: #!/bin/tcsh -f
start:
mycommand >> /tmp/output
sleep 30
goto start
